comments.body: Wouldn't it be better to use protobuf instead of a hand-rolled format? The added benefit of protobuf based implementation is that dumps can be crossed-checked between different versions of the software as we can lean on the built-in versioning support.

Yes, that may be a path forward. I'm open to changing this wire format later -- the current design allows switching over to something else by simply changing the methods in this class only. For simplicity I chose DataInputStream/DataOutputStream as an initial implementation.
Agreed, but I also think it's fine to follow up later.
